Room.Name: Highwire
Room.ShortDescription: You are balancing on a tightrope, very high up, looking down at the tigers.
Room.LongDescription: The highwire is the only way to get between the main platform and the left platform. It is quite dangerous, not only because of the long fall you would take if you fell, but also because of the beasts waiting below. Hopefully, you would not fall into the cage. Very nasty beasts are kept there.
